DOC.brief_summary: Intralipid infusion can improve outcome in women with recurrent Intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI) failure due to elevated TH1 cytokine response.
DOC.detailed_description: Infertile patients undergoing Intracytoplasmic Sperm Injection (ICSI) cycle with history of repeated implantation failure, intralipid will be given to the intervention group. The primary outcome measure is the clinical pregnancy rate, secondary outcome measures implantation rate, ongoing pregnancy rate, abortion rate.
DOC.criteria: Infertile patients undergoing ICSI cycle with history of repeated implantation failure 1. Disturbances of normal fat metabolism such as pathologic hyperlipemia 2. Allergic to it; or to eggs, soybean oil, or safflower oil. 3. Severe liver disease, kidney disease, lung disease, anemia, blood clotting disorder. 4. Uterine fibroid, endometrial polyp, endometriosis and hydrosalpinx.
